You probably have broken packages, which may cause problems, you will have to remove those.
Find the packages installed in that attempt to install kexec-tools and remove them they are broken, I think that is what is going on.
Try sudo dpkg --purge kexec-tools
then sudo apt-get clean && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade
